extDescription.message: Momentary notifications about the new PM and online status changes of your friends in VK social network

notGranted.message: You have not granted access to your data on VK.com yet

settingsStatus.message: Show notifications regarding contacts' online status changes

settingsMessages.message: Show notifications with the text of private messages

tokenExpired.message: VK Online extension needs to update VK API access key. Click onto this notification window to update the key right now.
